definition: A celestial being or spiritual entity that is believed to provide protection, guidance, and assistance to individuals in times of danger, distress, or need. It is commonly referred to in the context of personal safety and is often associated with the concept of a guardian angel.

examples.german: Mein Schutzengel hat mich vor einem Unfall gerettet.
examples.english: My guardian angel saved me from an accident.

examples.german: Ich fühle mich sicher, weil ich einen Schutzengel habe.
examples.english: I feel safe because I have a guardian angel.

examples.german: Der Schutzengel passt auf dich auf, egal wo du bist.
examples.english: The guardian angel watches over you no matter where you are.

examples.german: Ich bete zu meinem Schutzengel, um Schutz und Führung zu erhalten.
examples.english: I pray to my guardian angel to receive protection and guidance.

examples.german: Mein Schutzengel ist immer an meiner Seite.
examples.english: My guardian angel is always by my side.
